sourcesContent:
<template>
    <form @submit.prevent="submitUpdate">
      <!-- Form fields populated with the contact's current details -->
      <button type="submit">Save Changes</button>
    </form>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { fetchContacts, saveContacts } from '@/utils/storage';
  
  export default {
    props: ['id'],
    data() {
      return {
        contact: null, // Will hold the contact to update
      };
    },
    mounted() {
      this.loadContact();
    },
    methods: {
      loadContact() {
        const contacts = fetchContacts();
        this.contact = contacts.find(contact => contact.id.toString() === this.id);
        // Initialize form fields with this.contact's details
      },
      submitUpdate() {
        // Update the contact in the contacts array and save back to storage
        this.$router.push({ name: 'ContactDetails', params: { id: this.contact.id } });
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
